info.name: Estimate Service - Postman Test Suite
info.description:
## Prerequisites

Before running this collection, make sure to:

- Set up your environment variables.
    
- Set up the base url
    
- Setup the auth token by logging in
    
- To fill the estimate details You can fetch the sor details from mdms v2 for appropriate sor and then fill the UOM and SorID for that sor.
    
- After filling the Appropriate SOR and estimate details Check that workflow is correct or not then You can run the collection.
    
- It will execute all the endpoints by checking all the scenarios.
